Class Address

Representation of Address.

There are 4 types of address:

  1. Public key based
  2. Multi public key based (m, n)
  3. Contract based
  4. ONT ID based

The value is stored as base58 or hex encoded, therefore always use toBase58() or serialize() according to requirements.
